body_content.explanation: a type of paint that you put on a surface before the main paint is put on:
examples: It's best to use a coat of primer before the top coat.

body_content.explanation: a type of make-up that you put on your face under other make-up to make it go on more smoothly and last longer:
examples: Primers are used under foundation to keep your make-up in place for hours.

body_content.explanation: a small book containing basic facts about a subject, used especially when you are beginning to learn about that subject
a talk, experience, etc. that provides information from which you can learn:
examples: I think I should give you a quick primer on the basic setup and cast of characters.
